        public static double sumForce(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> list)
        Method to easily sum an ArrayList of Doubles (as Forces).
        Parameters:
        list - The Double ArrayList to sum up.
        Returns:
        The sum of all the ArrayList Doubles.

      • getTheta

        public static double getTheta(Body subject,
              Body target)
        Method to calculate the angle between two Bodies, using their X/Y.
        Parameters:
        subject - The starting Body.
        target - The Body for which we calculate the angle.
        Returns:
        A double rappresenting the degrees of the angle.

      • getNetXForce

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> getNetXForce(Body subject)
        Method to calculate the net X force on a Body.
        Parameters:
        subject - The Body on which the Forces are acting.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Doubles with all the X forces on the Body subject.

      • getNetYForce

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> getNetYForce(Body subject)
        Method to calculate the net Y force on a Body.
        Parameters:
        subject - The Body on which the Forces are acting.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Doubles with all the Y forces on the Body subject.

      • clearForces

        public static void clearForces()
        Method to clear the forces (so we can calculate forces for another Body). Actually, it's achieved by creating 2 new ArrayList (maybe will be changed...?)
        See Also:
